Net Worth & FI Net Worth Tracker

Net Worth is the total of everything you own minus what you owe. FI Net Worth (Financial Independence Net Worth) excludes non-liquid assets you do not plan to sell (e.g., primary home, vehicles). Use this to track your progress toward financial independence.
